title: UNICRI celebrates the UN 70th anniversary with Portugal and the UN Family in Lisbon Lisbon, ...
text: ( Source : UNICRI - United Nations Interregional Crime and Justice Research Institute ) Lisbon , 23 October 2015 . Only when we work together can we overcome shared threats and seize shared opportunities; only at the United Nations can all
